resources.string: In order to send Dictations from the App, you are required to sign up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service(ODDS).

In order to send Dictation from the App, you are required to sign up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service. 

Your dictations will be sent to an external server managed by ODDS.By sigining up, your dictations will be tranferred from the external server to a designated destination. 

 Please sign up to use ODDS as a trial. During the trial period,you can test the full functionality of the service.

 After the trial, you are required to purchase an annual license in order to continue using the ODDS.

 Click the following and sign up for the trial now.
"Please tap the button below if this is your first time to register for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service. "

If you already have a corporate account,please complete your registration from the following. 
 please confirm the following information with your administrator and enter the information in the next screen 
\u Account ID 
\u Password for Dictation Delivery Service 
\u Your email address
[For users that have a Corporate Account]
Account registration for Dictation Delivery Service
Please enter your company name or your personal name
Please create your Account ID. The ID must be less than 256 letters
Please set a password for your Account.The password must be more than 8 or less than 25 letters,numbers and symbolls.
Please enter an e-mail address for your Account.This email address can also be used for the first Author using the Dictation App.
Please make sure Personal name,AuthorID,Password and EmailID are correct
Please enter the email address for the Author who will use the Dictation App.
Please set an ID for the Author. Dictation files will be tagged with the Author ID . The ID must be more than 16 letters,number or under bars.
Please enter the e-mail destination for the dictation files from Author 1.If you with to add multiple destinations,please setup from olympus Dictation Portal after your complete the initial setup.
Please set a password for the Dictation Delivery Service.\n The password must be more than 8 or less than 25 letters,number and symbols.
Yes, i agree to the terms of Use

If you wish to continue using the Olympus Dictation Service, please Login to Olympus Dictation Portal

Licenses can be purchased under the [Account] Tab.

To purchase the licenses, please enter the following information.
\u2022 Country where you are based.
\u2022 The dealer you wish to purchase the lisence from.
\u2022 Number of lisences.

Olympus Dictation Portal URL
[-https://www.dictation-portal.com/-]
Thank you for sigining up for the Olympus Dictation Delivery Service.the trial license is valid for xx days.
This device is already activaed by another e-mail address
Invalid argument to activate to available license - Recipients is not set or invalide e-mail format - Author ID is blank or invalide character
Invalid ODP account. This ODP login ID is already registered
Invalid ODP e-mail address. ODP e-mail address for administrator is already registered.
Same smartphone has been already registered to another account
The Dictation file you sent is currently stored on your device. Once you have activated your ODDS trial, please resend the Dictation.

Thank you for using the olympus Dictation App.\\nFrom Olympus Dictation Version 2.0.0, function to send Dictation by email has been merged to Olympus Dictation Delivery Service(ODDS).Your Dictations will be sent via an external server managed by ODDS.
your file had been sent to the Dictation Delivery Server but could not be sent anywhere since the destination has not been sent.
Are you sure you want to send # recordings?
Tap here to read the Terms of Use for ODDS
Tap here to read the Terms of Use for ODDS
